overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a strong social media presence across multiple platforms, engaging with a diverse audience interested in computational social science, disinformation, and information operations. The engagement across platforms is steady, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction rates, particularly for professional and research announcements.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research papers, grants, and technological advancements.
Announcements for hiring and new research opportunities.
Sharing information about upcoming talks and conferences attended.

recommendations: Increase interaction with followers by posting more frequently and engaging directly with comments and discussions.
Leverage LinkedIn for professional networking and enhancing visibility of research outputs.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate with a focus on methodological discussions and tool updates.
platformInsights.linkedin: High engagement with posts related to research grants and job opportunities. Professional announcements resonate well with the audience.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
